newsitem.title: INDIA: Six children burnt to death in India bus fire.
newsitem.headline: Six children burnt to death in India bus fire.

text.p: Six children were burnt to death and 17 injured when a school bus caught fire in the northern Indian state of Haryana, the Press Trust of India (PTI) said on Monday.
The news agency said the accident occurred at a village near Mahendragarh, some 100 km (62 miles) from Delhi, on Sunday when a can of petrol kept near the driver's seat spilled over and caught fire.
